channel.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
channel.description:
im trying to add spawns and stuff like monsters and shops and people and items but i cannot view any of my .cfg files, can someone direct me to a tutorial or tell me what to do, here is a picture for you:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/33jsb4m.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“pkerjosh, post:10, topic:368747”]k well i got 3 errors and this is what i put in

                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome";

what did i do wrong to get 2 errors[/quote]

Post them?

item.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

pkerjosh:

kk i layed down a npc now how can i make him say stuff any help?

Do you mean overhead or dialogue?

dialogue:

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

overhead:

Something like,

                        if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE";
                        }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:4, topic:368747”][quote author=pkerjosh link=topic=464888.msg3399353#msg3399353 date=1289768214]
kk i opened it but its blank, is that becase im using a blank source?
[/quote]

Most likely, you can add NPCs by adding

spawn = NPCID xcoord ycoord 0 0 0 0 0 1 [/quote]make sure u use TAB key instead op spacebar

Read full topic

item.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

pkerjosh:

kk i opened it but its blank, is that becase im using a blank source?

Most likely, you can add NPCs by adding

spawn = NPCID	xcoord	ycoord	0	0	0	0	0	1

item.title: Help i dont know how to add npcs i cant view my .cfg file! :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Then notepad. If that doesn’t work open them, then open with…notepad.
